entry.title: $2500 // ASTORIA HUGE 2 BED. RM APT HEAT & HOT WATER INCLUDED (BROADWAY AREA)
entry.content:
Apartments listed by owner there are no broker fees or application fees!

Large, sun filled 2 bedroom apartment located in Broadway area of Astoria. $2500
Available Now
Heat and hot water included.
No pets
Please call show contact info

This large 2 bedroom apt is located in the most desirable area in Astoria - located just off Broadway. The apartment includes lots of closets, high ceilings, french doors, ceramic tile bathroom, parquet wood floors, large windows, intercom system, and covered radiators.

Apartment has beautiful white kitchen cabinets with plenty of counter space.
Laundromats half block from apartment. Everything needed is within a short walking distance.
Nearby supermarkets, restaurants, cafes and shops.

Three blocks to either R/M Steinway station and N,W Broadway subway station. Quick ten minute ride to Manhattan.

Short walk to Kauffman studios, movie theaters and libraries.
Near buses that run to Manhattan and through all parts of Queens.
For students easy commute to many Universities throughout the Metropolitan Area.
Great for business travelers-minutes from main highways, bridges and airport.
